summary: THIS ALUMINUM TRAILER IS 53 FEET LONG AND HAS A PIN TO CENTER OF REAR AXLE SPREAD OF 45 FEET, THE FEDERAL MOTOR CARRIER CALLS FOR A SPREAD OF 40.6 FEET, WHEN THE TRAILER IS LOADED IT BELLYS DOWN AND THE FRONT AXLE DIGS INTO THE SURFACE, THIS RIPS THE MAIN FRAME AND THE WHOLE AXLE COMES OUT FROM UNDER THE TRAILER, CONSUMER STATES THIS IS ILLEGAL.   *SLC
